name: Clean'Em Up
description: Clean’Em Up is a fast paced, arcade-style Top Down Shooter with neon graphics. You play as an Upgradable Antivirus. You seek and destroy tremendous viruses and threats, collect and protect files and survive huge Bosses. The story is simple: Your Computer has been hacked... Dozens of viruses and other threats have penetrated your System...
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: 7 处理器: Intel i3 内存: 1 GB RAM 图形: Intel built-in graphics card DirectX 版本: 11 存储空间: 需要 400 MB 可用空间
recommended_requirements: 推荐配置: 操作系统: 7 处理器: Intel i5 内存: 4 GB RAM 图形: Nvidia DirectX 版本: 11 存储空间: 需要 500 MB 可用空间

reviews.review_text: Clean Em Up is a pretty good top down shooter where you fight off computer viruses to proceed, upgradable ship and weapons and allround descent gameplay I would recommend it to anyone looking for a free to play arcade style game.
I have been looking for a new game to experience and i have found it! The game is addicting and a fun arcade, the idea of demenishing viruses is entertaining and satisfying.
